name: SuperCade
description:
An old school SHMUP, that is a little bit of fun and provides some short gameplay as a good lunch time breaker. The first game by me and I hope it's a little enjoyable one!

Get in there and pick between 1 of 2 ships and start shooting!

9 levels with 9 bosses to take down.

Plenty of different enemy ships to destroy.

3 bullet types with various levels.

3 different shield variations.

2 types of missiles though they both do the same thing, annihilate all enemy except bosses.

A few home made sound tracks.

It might not be a perfect game but it's a good little break your way through each short level. 

Happy SHMUPing!
